DOC.brief_summary: The exercise time important factor among medical guide weight loss ; however , still little knowledge exercise duration path middle-aged old woman . The present study aim determine effect interval train weight loss lipid profile , compare efficiency continuous training .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants include sedentary woman ( age 45-75 year ) overweight obesity ( n= 115 ) . They randomly divide two group include continuous exercise , interval exercise . The weight assessment parameter include change weight body composition , blood sample test perform pre- three month post-intervention .
DOC.criteria: Sedentary lifestyle Good Health Weight stability *Abnormality history Disease
